resources.string: • What it does: Helps you keep track of the score for both teams during a Truco game (Argentinian card game).
– Use the +/– buttons on the sides to add/remove points.
– Tap left or right half of the screen to quickly add points.
– Press the bottom button to start a new match. It auto-saves your progress.
